summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 CHEVROLET SILVERADO 1500. WHILE DRIVING OVER 50 MPH, THE VEHICLE SHOOK AND VIBRATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHO DIAGNOSED THAT THE TRANSMISSION TORQUE CONVERTER WAS FAULTY. THE TRANSMISSION WAS REBUILT, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED 99,000 MILES LATER. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO H&N CHEVROLET (713 GRAND AVE, SPENCER, IA) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE TORQUE CONVERTER FAILED AGAIN. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED AND DID NOT ASSIST. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 145,000. *BF  *TR
